TopicTitle: Game crashes in the middle of the loading screen

Articles.Content:
When i open the game everything works correctly and the loading starts. After a few minutes when the loading bar is in the middle the game crashes. I have no mods and the recommanded specs. I played the demo and the game was working just the full version does this. I have no DLCs . The crash log is :
 

Kerbal Space Program [version: Unity 2017.1.3p1 (02d73f71d3bd)]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0023:10110117.

Error occurred at 2020-08-26_162926.
D:\Games\Kerbal Space Program Making History\KSP.exe, run by anton.
93% memory in use.
3542 MB physical memory [238 MB free].
0 MB paging file [3 MB free].
0 MB user address space [1751 MB free].
Write to location 00000016 caused an access violation.

[SNIP!]

Edited August 26, 2020 by Gargamel
Giant wall of log text removed.

Welcome to the Forums @RoM_Axion.  We ask that you please host a log file on a service like Google Drive or Dropbox and link it here.   Large walls of text can make it hard to read on some platforms. 

7 minutes ago, RoM_Axion said:

3542 MB physical memory [238 MB free].

But here's your main issue.   4 GB is really tight for KSP to run on.   It's doable, but tight.   Shut down anything else you can that might be running in the background to free up RAM.

2 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

Welcome to the Forums @RoM_Axion.  We ask that you please host a log file on a service like Google Drive or Dropbox and link it here.   Large walls of text can make it hard to read on some platforms. 

But here's your main issue.   4 GB is really tight for KSP to run on.   It's doable, but tight.   Shut down anything else you can that might be running in the background to free up RAM. 

 

Thanks! I will get some more ram cause it is dirt cheap
